short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace or hide the words on the internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internet is full of slurs or other disappointing content. Replacer lets you hide or replace some words or phrases with more comfortable for you. Or you can just have fun. Let's make the web friendlier!
